objects.description: Monitor for logins to default accounts outside of expected contexts. For example, in ESXi environments, monitor the `/var/log/hostd.log` file for logins to the `vpxuser` default user account that do not come from the vCenter server IP or use the `VMWare-Client/X.X.X` user-agent.(Citation: Google Cloud Threat Intelligence ESXi Hardening 2023)
